name: Nubuwo Debut Bundle: adventures in videogame audio
blurb: The Nubuwo debut bundle brings together music by twelve international artists inspired by videogames.

rewards.reward: UPDATES all week on the Kickstarter blog, including new video interviews with game soundtrack composers.
HALF BUNDLE.  The above plus a Bandcamp download code for your choice of the Vocal or Instrumental Pack.  Music by 6 game-inspired artists in your preferred file format.
FULL DEBUT BUNDLE.  Blog updates and Bandcamp download codes for both Vocal and Instrumental packs.  Music by 12 game-inspired artists in your preferred file format.

DIGITAL ADVENTURES.  All of the above, plus a Bandcamp download code for a 25-track collection of previously unreleased, independently developed game music.  Includes four SPELUNKY shop themes by Eirik Suhrke from the 2012 Independent Games Festival Grand Prize finalist.  

ANTICHAMBER suite by Siddhartha Barnhoorn, featuring over 12 minutes of music from the 2012 IGF Technical Excellence finalist.  

BEAT SNEAK BANDIT main theme (extended mix) by Simon Flesser of Simogo Games, a finalist in the 2012 IGF in the mobile games category.

Daisuke "Pixel" Amaya's AZARASHI main theme for iOS, New Keychain jingle, New Record jingle, and Game Over theme, created using his PxTone Collage music software.   

Gryzor87's previously unreleased "RARE STUFF" 15-track collection, including Mozart and Vivaldi inspired HYDORAH variations, previously only heard in parallel universes and alternate dimensions. 

Additionally, two subtitled video interview files for iPad and iPhone 4 with FINAL FANTASY XI co-composers Nobuo Uematsu and Kumi Tanioka, formatted as m4v files. Both filmed and edited by Jeriaska, featuring original music by Matheus Manente.

As well as, IMERUAT wallpaper by FINAL FANTASY XIII composer Masashi Hamauzu.  And wallpaper by PixelJunk Eden / PixelJunk 4am art and music director Baiyon.

3-CD SET.  All of the above digital backer rewards, plus HYDORAH Original and Arranged Tracks 2-CD set by Spanish developer Locomalito and composer Gryzor87, in collaboration with Jeriaska and Yoshi Miyamoto.  Plus, a remix album on CD by friends of the website.  Free international shipping.

DISC PACK.  All of the above, along with Songs we heard in ilomilo on CD, signed by ilomilo composer Daniel Ols\u00e9n.  Plus, Videogame Music in Context in Japan on DVD, directed and edited by Jeriaska (not for resale).

SIGNED CD BUNDLE.  All of the above, plus IMERUAT single on CD signed by Masashi Hamauzu and Mina.  As well as Super Meat Boy soundtrack signed by Danny Baranowsky.  Twilight and Ghost Stories on CD signed by Chris Schlarb.  Also, a Bandcamp download code for the Retro City Rampage Soundtrack (a $7.99 value) courtesy of @RetroCR & @VideoGameAudio.  Free international shipping.

SIGNED CD BUNDLE, 8-BIT EDITION.  All of the above, plus Forever Famicom series CD signed by K-Murdock.  As well as Rock Special Edition CD signed by Takeshi Nagai of Sexy-Synthesizer.   Free international shipping.

ONE-OF-A-KIND VINYL BUNDLE.  Absolutely everything offered in the Kickstarter backer rewards shown above, plus Mega Ran 10 album on Vinyl, Chris Schlarb's PSYCHIC TEMPLE on Vinyl, arrange album featuring Sexy-Synthesizer on Vinyl, Zorya by Floex on Vinyl, and Shatter Official Soundtrack on Vinyl courtesy of Sidhe. Free international shipping.
